content.text:
# Collector's Item (Apo Hiking Society album)

| producer   =
| prev_title = In Concert #$%!?
| prev_year  = 1974
| next_title = Songwriter
| next_year  = 1976
}}
'Collector's Item' is the debut studio album of the Filipino trio Apo Hiking Society, released in 1975 under the Sunshine label.
Track listing
#"Move" (3:43)
#"Time Can Let It Wait" (3:11)
#"Rock n' Roll Music (Medley)" (with apologies to the Beatles) (5:59)
#"Kasal" (3:12)
#"Softly" (3:11)
#"Be Right" (2:58)
#"Leaving" (2:58)
#"Let Me Sing You a Song (Medley)" (with apologies to Donovan) (6:25)
#"Ano ang Ibig Mong Sabihin" (2:50)
#"I Love You" (2:53)
#"Be Nice to Your Fine Feather Friend" (0:21)
Related links
*[http://www.apohikingsociety.org/main.shtml Official Apo Hiking Society website]
